name: Jrimp 4: Yatta! Hell Is Real
description:
Installation Instructions:

- Dowload all parts for your platform

- Use Winrar or 7zip to unzip Jrimp4.part1

- Run .exe

Hell is real... and you're in it.

Oculus Founder Palmer Luckey has announced that he will be stepping down from the VR company after damaging Facebook's public image. "I'm sorry to say..." Palmer stated at a press conference on Thursday, "I did not make Jrimp 4. I really fricked up. I'm a near billionaire, got almost everything... but I don't got my name in Jrimp 4's credits. I'm sorry to Facebook, my parents... but most of all I'm sorry to myself."

Luckey has stepped down from his position at Facebook, stepped down a staircase straight to Hell.

This news comes amid a massive sea-change in the tech and gaming industries. Nearly every employee of every company has willfully walked backwards into the fires of Hell. The flames will baptize them.

_____________________________________________________________

This is the fourth installment in the Jrimp series. Please play the others first, or else this one won't make a whole lot of sense.

If you don't wanna click through them, you can watch my friends at Game Thesis play through Jrimp 3, or check out Streamer Charliewinsmore discover the series for the first time.

What started out as a stupid joke between friends has turned into an (almost) real game that I'm very proud of.

I love you! Thanks.

- Joe Buchholz
